detail_desc: Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and decorative metal ring at the top.
Fitted vest top in soft stretch jersey.

Shaping briefs in microfibre with a light shaping effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Laser-cut edges around the legs for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in jersey under a layer of sequined mesh. High, elasticated waist and gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Treggings in different colours of stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets with a frill trim on one pair, and real back pockets.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Calf-length skirt in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with an asymmetric flounce. Jersey underskirt.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a straight hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with embroidery, inset lace details and pin-tucks at the front. Small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with glass rhinestones.
Short skirt in sturdy, stretch, textured jersey with large patch pockets, an extended waistband with a press-stud at the front, and a visible zip down the front.
Hat in a rib-knit mohair blend.
V-neck blouse in softly draping satin with a concealed button band down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm.
Mules in chunky cotton canvas with concealed wedge heels and fold-down backs. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with lace and mesh details and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Cropped jumper in a soft, rib knit with long sleeves and a low neckline at the back with crossover straps.
Wide top in soft jersey with short dolman sleeves with lace insets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless lace top with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and a pleated peplum. Lined.

Long, oversized jumper in fine-knit wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slit at the cuffs and in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long, fine-knit polo-neck jumper in a soft viscose blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and rounded hem.
Cropped leggings in washed, superstretch denim. Elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared hems.
Briefs in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and wide legs with slits.
Long metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 9 cm.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections, a detachable faux fur collar, diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, side support, decorative gathers in the sides, and wide adjustable shoulder straps.

Suede court shoes with rounded toes and an adjustable foot strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels approx. 11 cm. Supplied in a drawstring fabric bag.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Cotton twill parka with a lined drawstring hood, stand-up collar and double-layered front section with a zip, wind flap and concealed press-studs. Concealed drawstring at the waist, flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, slits in the sides and a drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in mesh.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Single back vent. Pile lining at the top, quilted lining below.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed side panels and a kangaroo pocket. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Slim Fit.
Jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, detachable belt and tapered legs. Front, leg and back pockets.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, zip at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Laptop case in grained imitation leather with an all-over print and a zip. Size 26x35 cm. Fits computers up to 13”.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned jersey with a round neck and short butterfly sleeves.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Waterproof trainers in woven fabric with imitation leather sections, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Soft slippers in velour with appliqués and embroidery on the front. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Set with a cropped tube top and calf-length skirt in sequined, glittery jersey. Top with a concealed silicone trim at the top. Skirt with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Cap in a patterned weave with a brushed, velvety-smooth finish. Reversible-sequin motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Set with a print-patterned triangle bikini top and bottoms. Top with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that tie at the back. Bottoms with high-cut legs.
Large scarf in a soft, checked weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 65x200 cm.
Jacket in crushed velvet with narrow shawl lapels, front pockets, tape-trimmed inner seams and no buttons. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Double layer at the top. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Short V-neck dress in airy, flounced chiffon with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Set with two fruity, moisturising lip balms. 2x4 g.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.

Dungaree shorts in cotton twill with an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides. Fake fly, patch front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Long-sleeved shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck, elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
